Master Answer:
Individuals born before 1970 are generally assumed to have acquired immunity to measles from natural infection, and therefore  Measles, Mumps, Rubella (MMR) Vaccine is not recommended for these individuals. 
Immunization Nurse
Master Question: I'm 83 yrs old and live in BC. Should I get a measles shot. I grew up outside of Canada. Assume I was vaccinated as a child but not 100 % sure.
